title: The Indian in the Cupboard
description: "Skyhigh fantasy that will enthrall readers."-- "Publishers Weekly." A young man receives two presents that will change his life: a plastic miniature Indian that magically comes to life inside a mysterious old cupboard."Best novel of the year (1981)."-- "The New York Times."Rebecca Caudill Young Reader's Book Award, California Young Reader Medal, Pacific Northwest Young Readers Choice Award, A Virginia Young Readers Award.
author: Lynne Reid Banks
